frontmatter.title: How accessible are links?
frontmatter.excerpt: Links are one of the main basic elements that you’ll find on any website. Yet, a lot of them are not as accessible as we would like. If we don't know how they're interpreted by assistive technologies we’re bound to make some mistakes as developers.
